text: @NYGovCuomo https://t.co/rNrDagmJ57 Cuomo why are you killing NEW YORKERS! You blocked the use of anti malaria drugs in the treatment of COVID-19 and as a precaution for front line workers and people who have been exposed! You have blood on your hands!!! .@realDonaldTrump
